Title: Kirk's Folly "Twilight Crystal Barrette" Hair Jewelry- Antique Silvertone
Description: Beautiful Kirks Folly Hair Jewelry! This Twilight Primrose Sparkle Barrette Reflects All Kinds of Light. Faceted Icy Clear Crystals are Surrounded by Sparkling Aurora Borealis Crystals in Shapes of Flowers. The Leaf even has some Crystals. Set in Antique Silver Tone French Closure. A French Closure is Easier to use as You Only Have to Squeeze the Sides Together at The End. The Clasp will "Pop" Open. The Curved Bar Also Serves as a Spring which will Keep the Barrette Tight when Closed. This Piece is New and Marked Kirks Folly / France / USA on the Back. Measures Approximately 3-3/4" L. x 2" W.
